summary: This function retrieves the size of a collection.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val input = [%22Mercury%22, %22Venus%22, %22Earth%22, %22Mars%22];%0A%0A    val size = F::len(input);%0A%0A    F::println(%22Size = %22 .. size);%0A}
